summary: Pikachu is a famous Pokémon, known for its cute look and electric powers. It's a yellow mouse with red cheeks and a lightning tail. Created by Atsuko Nishida and Ken Sugimori, Pikachu first appeared in Pokémon Red and Blue games. It evolves from Pichu and turns into Raichu. Pikachu is the face of the Pokémon franchise, starring in the anime and many games, like Pokémon Go. Its popularity comes from its adorable design and role in the Pokémon TV show. Many people love Pikachu, making it an icon in Japanese pop culture.
title: Pikachu
